channel.title: [VFM] Elf Gold Rush - Signups (15/15)
channel.description:
# Welcome to Gold Rush, hosted by @Arete and @Nightingale !
*Credit to Bearsquared from Mafia Universe for creating the setup.*
# Rules:
Follow the Global Forum Rules, given in this post:
https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926
Additionally, for this game, a minimum requirement of **15 substantive, on-topic, game related posts** per in game day are required. Posts that are explicitly or obviously made solely for the purpose of meeting this requirement do not count towards the minimum, nor do posts containing *solely* a vote. Players who fail to meet this requirement will be immediately force-replaced at the discretion of the hosts. This requirement may be reduced or waived if an execution is hammered early by majority.
Arete is the alt mod for this game. Contact them if you wish to play on an alt.
The game will begin when full.
# Role List
[color = ligreen] Elf Doctor [/color] [color = ligreen] Elf Motion Detector[/color] [color = ligreen] Elf 1-shot Vigilante (Night 2+) [/color] [color = ligreen] Vanilla Elf[/color] x 9 [color = red] Human Roleblocker [/color] [color = red] Human Goon [/color] x 2
Sample role PMs:
Note: All role PMs include a character name and a small amount of flavor. The Humans will be given flavor safeclaims. You can talk about flavor if you want, but it won't be alignment or role indicative.
[details="Summary"] > # [color = ligreen] Anfalen, Vanilla Elf [/color] > > You are Anfalen, Vanilla Elf. Your only weapons are your voice and your vote. > > *“Many are the strange chances of the world, and help oft shall come from the hands of the weak when the Wise falter.”* > > *Defeat the Humans.*
> # [color = ligreen] Anfalen, Elf Doctor [/color] > > You are Anfalen, Elf Doctor. Every night, you may target a player, protecting them from attacks. You may not target the same player twice in a row. > > *“Many are the strange chances of the world, and help oft shall come from the hands of the weak when the Wise falter.”* > > *Defeat the Humans.*
> # [color = ligreen] Anfalen, Elf Motion Detector [/color] > > You are Anfalen, Elf Motion Detector. Every night, you may target a player to determine if they visited someone or were visited by anyone. You will not know which happened. > > *“Many are the strange chances of the world, and help oft shall come from the hands of the weak when the Wise falter.”* > > *Defeat the Humans.*
> # [color = ligreen] Anfalen, Elf 1-shot Vigilante (Cycle 2+) [/color] > > You are Anfalen, Elf 1-shot Vigilante (Cycle 2+). Once per game, at night, you may kill another player. This ability cannot be used Night 1. > > *“Many are the strange chances of the world, and help oft shall come from the hands of the weak when the Wise falter.”* > > *Defeat the Humans.*
> # [color = red]Martha, Human Roleblocker [/color] > > You are a Human Roleblocker. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow Humans. Each night, the Humans must kill a player outside your faction. Additionally, each night, you may roleblock a player. You may not target the same player twice in a row. > > *Reach parity with the Elves.*
> # [color = red]Martha, Human Goon[/color] > > You are a Human Goon. You share a 24/7 private chat with your fellow Humans. Each night, the Humans must kill a player outside your faction. > > *Reach parity with the Elves.* [/details]
[details=Motion Detector feedback]
**Motion Detector:** "Your target used an action or an action was used on them last night!" "Your target did not use an action and no actions were used on them!" "Your investigation failed!"
[/details]
# Gameplay
- The uninformed majority in this setup is the Elves and the informed minority is the Humans. - The set-up is a 15 player set-up with 9 Vanilla Elves, 1 Elf Doctor, 1 Elf Motion Detector, 1 Elf 1-shot Vigilante (Cycle 2+), 1 Human Roleblocker, and 2 Human Goons. - Flips are **alignment-only**, and will not reveal the role. (They may reveal non-role-indicative parts of their flavor.) - No role can self-target. The Human Roleblocker may roleblock other Humans, but the Humans may not factional kill other Humans. - The Doctor cannot target the same player on two consecutive nights. - The Roleblocker cannot target the same player on two consecutive nights. - Days are 48 hours unless majority is reached early and nights are 24 hours. - Executions are majority and plurality. - No-execute is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-execute and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-execute will have priority in the rand. In all other cases of a tie, the execution will be determined at random from among the tied players. - Self-votes are considered valid votes. - Votes are locked in LyLo (execute-or-lose) scenarios, but not in MyLo (misexecute-and-lose) scenarios. That is to say, in situations where elves must execute correctly or lose, the first vote cast by a given player is final and cannot be changed. - All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote**. This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. - The Human factional kill is assigned. If the member performing the factional kill is not specified, the last member to submit a kill will be assumed to be performing it. - The Human factional kill is mandatory. If no factional kill is submitted, the kill will be determined randomly from among living Elves. - The Humans will communicate through a private Discord server or forum topic.
# Player List: 1. Aelin 2. clonedcheese 3. thepigeonnyc 4. EliThePsycho 6. Leafia 7. January 8. Vulgard 9. Marluxion 10. Zone_Q11 11. Silviu 12. min 13. City 14. Nuclear_Rehab 15. WindwardAway 16. Clownzu
# Backups: 1. Chloe 2. sulit 3. Whysper 5. Arctic 6. Prophylaxis
# Spectators: 1. DatBird (uninformed) 2. katze 3. Marshal (uninformed) 4. Intensify (uninformed) 6. Jane (uninformed) 7. KyoDaz (uninformed)
# Milestones:

item.title: [VFM] Elf Gold Rush - Signups (15/15)
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
All rolecards have been sent out. If you did not receive a rolecard, PRIVATELY DM me to inform me of this.

The game will begin 2021-07-16T21:00:00Z.

Yes, I know, it’s not an ideal start time in some time zones, I was prioritizing having an EoD that most people could make. Sorry.

Read full topic
